content: 1 ziggy grocery bag holder by kalene gardner brilliant button ziggy grocery bag holder by brilliant button ©2020 kalene gardner all rights reserved pattern for personal use only not to be distributed copied or resold etc in any way you may sell the final product created by following the pattern but please use your own pictures and reference brilliant button in listings thank you ziggy grocery bag holder by brilliant button ©2020 kalene gardner 2 materials 2 colors of yarn for extra fun choose one variegated yarn and one solid size h hook 5mm abreviations chain chain sl slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet blo back loop only dcdec double_crochet decrease dcinc double_crochet increase or two double_crochet in one stitch skip skip notes i do not count chain 2 start as a double_crochet change color with the last pull through of last stitch on a row you do not have to tie off every row instead drop color and pick up the new color dropping the color will make a loop between row make sure this loop stays on the inside of the product you can adjust the size further by adding or subtracting row this pattern makes them about 15 inches long and offers three different sizes small s medium m and large l the pictures below show the three sizes side by side ziggy grocery bag holder by brilliant button ©2020 kalene gardner 3 with primary color row 1 chain 24 row 2 sl to first st without twisting and single_crochet around 24 row 3 4 blo single_crochet around 2 row 24 row 5 chain 2 double_crochet dcinc repeat around sl to chain 2 36 forsmall skip to row 8 row 6 chain 2 2 double_crochet dcinc repeat around sl to chain 2 48 for medium skip to row 8 row 7 for large chain 2 3 double_crochet dcinc repeat around sl to chain 2 60 row 8 chain 2 2 double_crochet in 1 stitch skip 1 repeat around change to 2nd color with last stitch s 36 m 48 l 60 there should be 18 pairs for small 24 for medium and 30 for large now we will work in between the pairs not in the top of the stitches but between the posts row 9 chain 2 2 double_crochet between paired posts skip space and repeat around change to primary color with last pull through s 18 pairs m 24 pairs l 30 pairs row 10 chain 2 2 double_crochet between paired posts skip space and repeat around change to secondary color with last pull through s 18 pairs m 24 pairs l 30 pairs row 11 31 repeat row 9 and 10 repeat them 15 times the final row should be in the primary color do not change color on the last row s 18 pairs m 24 pairs l 30 pairs row 32 chain 2 3 double_crochet decrease repeat around double_crochet in extra at end s 29 m 39 l 48 row 33 chain 15
